objective: Innovative and detail-oriented Software Engineer with hands-on experience in developing full-stack applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and knowledge of creating web automation and data scraping solutions. Demonstrated ability to lead and collaborate on diverse projects, developing user-friendly interfaces. Good problem-solving skills, with a focus on delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Learned backend development using Node.js and Express.js.
Gained experience with React Query, React Table, and React Hook Form (with Yup for validation).
Worked on UI design and setting up full-stack projects.
Developed a CRM system with full-stack features, including user authentication.
Explored GraphQL basics and created ExpenseQL, a GraphQL-based expense tracker with MongoDB session-based authentication.
Implemented circular graphs to visualize monthly expense data.

experience.title: Freelancer
responsibilities: Developed a web dashboard for crypto asset selection and alert routing.
Developed Selenium Base Web Automation Bot with API integration for scraping and automation.
Managed and deployed bots on the server.
Deployed the project on Vercel and assigned a GoDaddy domain.

experience.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Wrote Python scripts to automate daily web tasks for clients.
Developed web-based applications using React (front end) and Node.js (backend).
Improved application performance through optimization and caching strategies.

projects.name: SoftQuant

projects.name: ExpenseQL: GraphQL Expense Tracker

Used React.js for frontend development and React Hook Form with Yup for form validation.

Utilized React Table for efficient data display and management.

projects.name: WebX AI Chat Bot
